name: Rabona
description: Rabona Agency Is the first decentralized football scouting agency sharing revenues from player signings with their community backers. Rabona Agency is supporting professional football players, funding the resources needed to boost their career. With our DAO, we aim to let our talented football players get a chance to showcase their talent at a professional level and with the objective to get our players contracted. The Rabona Agency is excited to offer a way for our community members to benefit from our growth. By staking their rabona tokens, they will receive a percentage of the total commissions generated by the agency.
